name: Vroom Vroom Brooms
description:
This game was made as part of the Pigsquad June 2019 Summer Slow Jam over the course of 9 days.  The technical theme was "Arcade" and the creative theme was "Occult Classic".

Controls:

  • Xbox Controls
    • Turn - Left Joystick
    • Accelerate - A
    • Brake/Reverse - B
    • Use Pick Up - X
    • Pause - Start Button
    • Reset - Select Button
  • Keyboard
    • Player 1
      • Movement - WASD
      • Use Pick Up - E
    • Player 2
      • Movement - Arrow keys
      • Use Pick Up - Right Shift
    • Reset - Escape
    • Pause - Backspace

Credits:

- Pat Farnach (Programming)

- Mark Nerys (2D & 3d Art)

- Eric Phillips (Music)

- Tristan Damron (Project Management)
